get.description: List toolsets with pagination and search
Get the type definitions for toolsets

arguments.description: call function with arguments in JSON format

index.description: Index is not nil only in chat completion chunk object

title.description: Optional: if provided, use this title; otherwise generate automatically

config.description: Additional configuration`          // Configuration (includes api_key, model_id, base_url, etc.)

is_default.description: Whether this is the default model

x-enum-comments.PasswordComplexityHigh: Secure: must include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
x-enum-comments.PasswordComplexityMedium: Medium: combination of any two of uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
x-enum-comments.PasswordComplexityVeryHigh: Very secure: must include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters

org_permission.description: OrgPermission indicates if this permission is organization-scoped

ai_tool_permissions.description: AIToolPermissions stores the AI tool permissions assigned to the role.

organization_id.description:
OrganizationID is the organization this role belongs to. If empty, the role is global.
Role names must be unique within the same organization (or among global roles if OrganizationID is nil)

policy_document.description: Permission configuration based on IAM-style policies, stored in JSON format

Action.description: List of actions, can contain wildcards "*"

Resource.description: List of resources, can contain wildcards "*"

options.description: Static options (used when DataSource is nil or type=static)

cache_ttl.description: Cache TTL in seconds (0 = no expiration)

depends_on.description:
DependsOn specifies field dependencies (field names that this field depends on)
When dependent fields change, this field's options should be reloaded

filter.description:
Filter conditions (flexible filtering for different source types)
For toolsets: {"type": "webhook"} to filter by toolset type
For internal: {"status": "active"} to filter by status, etc.

label_key.description: Response mapping fields (for API and other sources)

params.description: Parameters for API requests (query params or request body)

type.description: Type specifies the data source type

field.description: Field is the name of the field to check

operator.description: Operator is the comparison operator (eq, ne, in, not_in, contains)

value.description: Value is the value to compare against (can be a single value or array for in/not_in)
